actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to limit Federal pay increases to 5 percent for a specified period of time and for other purposes.

summary.text: Limits Federal pay increases to 5 percent for the period of January 1, 1975, through June 30, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to limit Federal pay increases to 5 percent for a specified period of time and for other purposes.
